name: cloud-nine

effect.diamond-pearl: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects. This ability functions identically to air lock.
effect.platinum: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects. This ability functions identically to air lock.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects. This ability functions identically to air lock.

short_effect: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.
